section.title: Description
section.p: Wget is a tool to download files via HTTP or FTP. In the BUSMASTER project it is used to download the hardware APIs and drivers.

section.title: Download
section.p: Wget is available for download at http://www.gnu.org/s/wget/. However a Windows version is already in the repository in the Tools folder.

section.title: Installation
section.p: There is no installation necessary as Wget is already in the repository in the Tools folder.
